Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Exchange/75th-76th
ShortDescription: Northbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore and 71st: due to, street blockage near Exchange/75th-76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore and 71st: due to, street blockage near Exchange/75th-76th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
